Heat Metal (Condition)

Metal weapons are dropped if the weilder fails their Saving Throw. If the target is touching the heated metal, they receive Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Ability Checks. Every turn the target is touching the heated metal, the caster can use a Bonus Action to deal another 2d8 Fire damage, forcing the target to Save or drop the weapon.

How to Acquire Heat Metal

Heat Metal can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Druid H
